ollama.drivers/biography: In this path there is information about the lives of different Formula 1 drivers who belonged to the Aston Martin, Ferrari, McLaren or Mercedes brands
ollama.drivers/titles: In this path there is information about titles, achievements and records of different Formula 1 drivers who belonged to the Aston Martin, Ferrari, McLaren or Mercedes brands
ollama.history/companies: In this path there is information about the history of the Aston Martin, Ferrari, McLaren or Mercedes brands
ollama.history/formula1_team: In this path there is information about the history of Aston Martin, Ferrari, McLaren or Mercedes in Formula 1
ollama.models/ferrari: In this path there is information about car models of the brands Ferrari, like Ferrari 488 GTB, Ferrari 812 Superfast, Ferrari LaFerrari...
ollama.models/mclaren: In this path there is information about car models of the brands Mclaren, like McLaren 570S, McLaren 720S, McLaren P1...
ollama.models/mercedes: In this path there is information about car models of the brands Mercedes, like Mercedes-AMG GT, Mercedes-AMG One, Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG...
ollama.models/aston_martin: In this path there is information about car models of the brands Aston Martin, like Aston Martin DB11, Aston Martin Valhalla, Aston Martin Vantage...
